Flurries Cowl

Download free pattern! View on Ravelry

Originally the kick off pattern of The Great Cowl KAL 2012, Flurries Cowl led the charge as many crazed knitters attempted to complete 5 patterns in 50 days. Flurries Cowl is free to download.

Living in Chicago has taught me a lot about cold weather wear, and it’s only December. Bundling up is essential, but sometimes you overheat. This cowl is designed to combat woeful winter predicaments. A double set of buttons lets you button it loose or tight, allowing you to keep warm or stay cool and comfortable.

Loop it over your head to protect ears and necks from chilly breezes, or wear it cape-style under a coat to add an extra layer of warmth.

Errata

Small error in row 4 of brioche.

Row 4 should read:
Row 4: k2, •(k2tog, k1), repeat from • to m, slm, k5.

Pattern Information

Gauge

24 stitches and 32 rows = 4 inches in Stockinette stitch, smaller needle

Yardage

200 - 230 yards Sport / 5 ply (12 wpi)

Yarns

Becoming Art Agave sport (old base) (Sport)

Needles

US 4 - 3.5 mm US 8 - 5.0 mm

Sizes

One - 8”/20cm tall, 21”/53cm in diameter (stockinette) 29” in diameter (brioche/garter) 20”/51cm in diameter (second buttons).

About pattern purchases

Patterns are sold as downloadable PDF files through Ravelry, with payments processed by PayPal. You do not need an account to use either service.

If you have a Ravelry account, I suggest logging in prior to purchasing so that patterns are added to your library.

Get pattern help

Pattern support is provided free of charge for all of my patterns. We respond as quickly as possible, but sometimes it can take a day or two.

Submit a new help request through Zendesk.

You can also use Zendesk to report errors and ask non-technical questions.

Alternatively, you can try the Ravelry group.

Support is only provided via Zendesk.

FAQ

Can I teach a class using your knitting pattern?

Teaching licensing is temporarily on hold and should resume in 2014.

Can I sell items made using your knitting patterns for profit or charity?

Not at this time.

How do I order wholesale copies for my LYS?

Pattern wholesaling is temporarily on hold and should resume in 2014.

I found an error, how do I report it?

Oh newts! Submit your error through Zendesk and we will fix it.

Happy knitting!
